name: Real.log_div_log
initialProofState:
b x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv (Real.log x) (Real.log b)) (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem log_div_log : log x / log b = logb b x :=
  rfl

name: Real.logb_zero
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b 0) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_zero : logb b 0 = 0 := by simp [logb]

name: Real.logb_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b 1) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_one : logb b 1 = 0 := by simp [logb]

name: Real.logb_zero_left
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb 0 x) 0
decl: theorem logb_zero_left : logb 0 x = 0 := by simp only [‚Üê log_div_log, log_zero, div_zero]

name: Real.logb_zero_left_eq_zero
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb 0) 0
decl: @[simp] theorem logb_zero_left_eq_zero : logb 0 = 0 := by ext; rw [logb_zero_left, Pi.zero_apply]

name: Real.logb_one_left
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb 1 x) 0
decl: theorem logb_one_left : logb 1 x = 0 := by simp only [‚Üê log_div_log, log_one, div_zero]

name: Real.logb_one_left_eq_zero
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb 1) 0
decl: @[simp] theorem logb_one_left_eq_zero : logb 1 = 0 := by ext; rw [logb_one_left, Pi.zero_apply]

name: Real.logb_self_eq_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b b) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma logb_self_eq_one (hb : 1 < b) : logb b b = 1 :=
  div_self (log_pos hb).ne'

name: Real.logb_self_eq_one_iff
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (Real.logb b b) 1) (And (Ne b 0) (And (Ne b 1) (Ne b (-1))))
decl:
lemma logb_self_eq_one_iff : logb b b = 1 ‚Üî b ‚â† 0 ‚àß b ‚â† 1 ‚àß b ‚â† -1 :=
  Iff.trans ‚ü®fun h h' => by simp [logb, h'] at h, div_self‚ü© log_ne_zero

name: Real.logb_abs
initialProofState:
b x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (abs x)) (Real.logb b x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_abs (x : ‚Ñù) : logb b |x| = logb b x := by rw [logb, logb, log_abs]

name: Real.logb_neg_eq_logb
initialProofState:
b x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (Neg.neg x)) (Real.logb b x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_neg_eq_logb (x : ‚Ñù) : logb b (-x) = logb b x := by
  rw [‚Üê logb_abs x, ‚Üê logb_abs (-x), abs_neg]

name: Real.logb_mul
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hx : Ne x 0
hy : Ne y 0
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (HMul.hMul x y)) (HAdd.hAdd (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y))
decl:
theorem logb_mul (hx : x ‚â† 0) (hy : y ‚â† 0) : logb b (x * y) = logb b x + logb b y := by
  simp_rw [logb, log_mul hx hy, add_div]

name: Real.logb_div
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hx : Ne x 0
hy : Ne y 0
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (HDiv.hDiv x y)) (HSub.hSub (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y))
decl:
theorem logb_div (hx : x ‚â† 0) (hy : y ‚â† 0) : logb b (x / y) = logb b x - logb b y := by
  simp_rw [logb, log_div hx hy, sub_div]

name: Real.logb_inv
initialProofState:
b x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (Inv.inv x)) (Neg.neg (Real.logb b x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_inv (x : ‚Ñù) : logb b x‚Åª¬π = -logb b x := by simp [logb, neg_div]

name: Real.inv_logb
initialProofState:
a b : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Inv.inv (Real.logb a b)) (Real.logb b a)
decl: theorem inv_logb (a b : ‚Ñù) : (logb a b)‚Åª¬π = logb b a := by simp_rw [logb, inv_div]

name: Real.inv_logb_mul_base
initialProofState:
a b : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne a 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne b 0
c : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Inv.inv (Real.logb (HMul.hMul a b) c)) (HAdd.hAdd (Inv.inv (Real.logb a c)) (Inv.inv (Real.logb b c)))
decl:
theorem inv_logb_mul_base {a b : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : a ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : b ‚â† 0) (c : ‚Ñù) :
    (logb (a * b) c)‚Åª¬π = (logb a c)‚Åª¬π + (logb b c)‚Åª¬π := by
  simp_rw [inv_logb]; exact logb_mul h‚ÇÅ h‚ÇÇ

name: Real.inv_logb_div_base
initialProofState:
a b : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne a 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne b 0
c : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Inv.inv (Real.logb (HDiv.hDiv a b) c)) (HSub.hSub (Inv.inv (Real.logb a c)) (Inv.inv (Real.logb b c)))
decl:
theorem inv_logb_div_base {a b : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : a ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : b ‚â† 0) (c : ‚Ñù) :
    (logb (a / b) c)‚Åª¬π = (logb a c)‚Åª¬π - (logb b c)‚Åª¬π := by
  simp_rw [inv_logb]; exact logb_div h‚ÇÅ h‚ÇÇ

name: Real.logb_mul_base
initialProofState:
a b : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne a 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne b 0
c : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb (HMul.hMul a b) c) (Inv.inv (HAdd.hAdd (Inv.inv (Real.logb a c)) (Inv.inv (Real.logb b c))))
decl:
theorem logb_mul_base {a b : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : a ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : b ‚â† 0) (c : ‚Ñù) :
    logb (a * b) c = ((logb a c)‚Åª¬π + (logb b c)‚Åª¬π)‚Åª¬π := by rw [‚Üê inv_logb_mul_base h‚ÇÅ h‚ÇÇ c, inv_inv]

name: Real.logb_div_base
initialProofState:
a b : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne a 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne b 0
c : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb (HDiv.hDiv a b) c) (Inv.inv (HSub.hSub (Inv.inv (Real.logb a c)) (Inv.inv (Real.logb b c))))
decl:
theorem logb_div_base {a b : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : a ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : b ‚â† 0) (c : ‚Ñù) :
    logb (a / b) c = ((logb a c)‚Åª¬π - (logb b c)‚Åª¬π)‚Åª¬π := by rw [‚Üê inv_logb_div_base h‚ÇÅ h‚ÇÇ c, inv_inv]

name: Real.mul_logb
initialProofState:
a b c : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne b 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne b 1
h‚ÇÉ : Ne b (-1)
‚ä¢ Eq (HMul.hMul (Real.logb a b) (Real.logb b c)) (Real.logb a c)
decl:
theorem mul_logb {a b c : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : b ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : b ‚â† 1) (h‚ÇÉ : b ‚â† -1) :
    logb a b * logb b c = logb a c := by
  unfold logb
  rw [mul_comm, div_mul_div_cancel‚ÇÄ (log_ne_zero.mpr ‚ü®h‚ÇÅ, h‚ÇÇ, h‚ÇÉ‚ü©)]

name: Real.div_logb
initialProofState:
a b c : Real
h‚ÇÅ : Ne c 0
h‚ÇÇ : Ne c 1
h‚ÇÉ : Ne c (-1)
‚ä¢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv (Real.logb a c) (Real.logb b c)) (Real.logb a b)
decl:
theorem div_logb {a b c : ‚Ñù} (h‚ÇÅ : c ‚â† 0) (h‚ÇÇ : c ‚â† 1) (h‚ÇÉ : c ‚â† -1) :
    logb a c / logb b c = logb a b :=
  div_div_div_cancel_left' _ _ <| log_ne_zero.mpr ‚ü®h‚ÇÅ, h‚ÇÇ, h‚ÇÉ‚ü©

name: Real.logb_rpow_eq_mul_logb_of_pos
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (HPow.hPow x y)) (HMul.hMul y (Real.logb b x))
decl:
theorem logb_rpow_eq_mul_logb_of_pos (hx : 0 < x) : logb b (x ^ y) = y * logb b x := by
  rw [logb, log_rpow hx, logb, mul_div_assoc]

name: Real.logb_pow
initialProofState:
b x : Real
k : Nat
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (HPow.hPow x k)) (HMul.hMul (‚Üëk) (Real.logb b x))
decl:
theorem logb_pow (b x : ‚Ñù) (k : ‚Ñï) : logb b (x ^ k) = k * logb b x := by
  rw [logb, logb, log_pow, mul_div_assoc]

name: Real.logb_rpow
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (HPow.hPow b x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_rpow : logb b (b ^ x) = x := by
  rw [logb, div_eq_iff, log_rpow b_pos]
  exact log_b_ne_zero b_pos b_ne_one

name: Real.rpow_logb_eq_abs
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
hx : Ne x 0
‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow b (Real.logb b x)) (abs x)
decl:
theorem rpow_logb_eq_abs (hx : x ‚â† 0) : b ^ logb b x = |x| := by
  apply log_injOn_pos
  ¬∑ simp only [Set.mem_Ioi]
    apply rpow_pos_of_pos b_pos
  ¬∑ simp only [abs_pos, mem_Ioi, Ne, hx, not_false_iff]
  rw [log_rpow b_pos, logb, log_abs]
  field_simp [log_b_ne_zero b_pos b_ne_one]

name: Real.rpow_logb
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow b (Real.logb b x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem rpow_logb (hx : 0 < x) : b ^ logb b x = x := by
  rw [rpow_logb_eq_abs b_pos b_ne_one hx.ne']
  exact abs_of_pos hx

name: Real.rpow_logb_of_neg
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
hx : LT.lt x 0
‚ä¢ Eq (HPow.hPow b (Real.logb b x)) (Neg.neg x)
decl:
theorem rpow_logb_of_neg (hx : x < 0) : b ^ logb b x = -x := by
  rw [rpow_logb_eq_abs b_pos b_ne_one (ne_of_lt hx)]
  exact abs_of_neg hx

name: Real.logb_eq_iff_rpow_eq
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (Real.logb b y) x) (Eq (HPow.hPow b x) y)
decl:
theorem logb_eq_iff_rpow_eq (hy : 0 < y) : logb b y = x ‚Üî b ^ x = y := by
  constructor <;> rintro rfl
  ¬∑ exact rpow_logb b_pos b_ne_one hy
  ¬∑ exact logb_rpow b_pos b_ne_one

name: Real.surjOn_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Set.SurjOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Ioi 0) Set.univ
decl:
theorem surjOn_logb : SurjOn (logb b) (Ioi 0) univ := fun x _ =>
  ‚ü®b ^ x, rpow_pos_of_pos b_pos x, logb_rpow b_pos b_ne_one‚ü©

name: Real.logb_surjective
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Function.Surjective (Real.logb b)
decl: theorem logb_surjective : Surjective (logb b) := fun x => ‚ü®b ^ x, logb_rpow b_pos b_ne_one‚ü©

name: Real.range_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Eq (Set.range (Real.logb b)) Set.univ
decl:
@[simp]
theorem range_logb : range (logb b) = univ :=
  (logb_surjective b_pos b_ne_one).range_eq

name: Real.surjOn_logb'
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_ne_one : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Set.SurjOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Iio 0) Set.univ
decl:
theorem surjOn_logb' : SurjOn (logb b) (Iio 0) univ := by
  intro x _
  use -b ^ x
  constructor
  ¬∑ simp only [Right.neg_neg_iff, Set.mem_Iio]
    apply rpow_pos_of_pos b_pos
  ¬∑ rw [logb_neg_eq_logb, logb_rpow b_pos b_ne_one]

name: Real.logb_le_logb
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
h : LT.lt 0 x
h‚ÇÅ : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)) (LE.le x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_le_logb (h : 0 < x) (h‚ÇÅ : 0 < y) : logb b x ‚â§ logb b y ‚Üî x ‚â§ y := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_le_div_iff_of_pos_right (log_pos hb), log_le_log_iff h h‚ÇÅ]

name: Real.logb_le_logb_of_le
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
h : LT.lt 0 x
hxy : LE.le x y
‚ä¢ LE.le (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem logb_le_logb_of_le (h : 0 < x) (hxy : x ‚â§ y) : logb b x ‚â§ logb b y :=
  (logb_le_logb hb h (by linarith)).mpr hxy

name: Real.logb_lt_logb
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hxy : LT.lt x y
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)
decl:
@[gcongr]
theorem logb_lt_logb (hx : 0 < x) (hxy : x < y) : logb b x < logb b y := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_lt_div_iff_of_pos_right (log_pos hb)]
  exact log_lt_log hx hxy

name: Real.logb_lt_logb_iff
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)) (LT.lt x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_lt_logb_iff (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) : logb b x < logb b y ‚Üî x < y := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_lt_div_iff_of_pos_right (log_pos hb)]
  exact log_lt_log_iff hx hy

name: Real.logb_le_iff_le_rpow
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) y) (LE.le x (HPow.hPow b y))
decl:
theorem logb_le_iff_le_rpow (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x ‚â§ y ‚Üî x ‚â§ b ^ y := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_le_rpow_left_iff hb, rpow_logb (b_pos hb) (b_ne_one' hb) hx]

name: Real.logb_lt_iff_lt_rpow
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) y) (LT.lt x (HPow.hPow b y))
decl:
theorem logb_lt_iff_lt_rpow (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x < y ‚Üî x < b ^ y := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_lt_rpow_left_iff hb, rpow_logb (b_pos hb) (b_ne_one' hb) hx]

name: Real.le_logb_iff_rpow_le
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x (Real.logb b y)) (LE.le (HPow.hPow b x) y)
decl:
theorem le_logb_iff_rpow_le (hy : 0 < y) : x ‚â§ logb b y ‚Üî b ^ x ‚â§ y := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_le_rpow_left_iff hb, rpow_logb (b_pos hb) (b_ne_one' hb) hy]

name: Real.lt_logb_iff_rpow_lt
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x (Real.logb b y)) (LT.lt (HPow.hPow b x) y)
decl:
theorem lt_logb_iff_rpow_lt (hy : 0 < y) : x < logb b y ‚Üî b ^ x < y := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_lt_rpow_left_iff hb, rpow_logb (b_pos hb) (b_ne_one' hb) hy]

name: Real.logb_pos_iff
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt 0 (Real.logb b x)) (LT.lt 1 x)
decl:
theorem logb_pos_iff (hx : 0 < x) : 0 < logb b x ‚Üî 1 < x := by
  rw [‚Üê @logb_one b]
  rw [logb_lt_logb_iff hb zero_lt_one hx]

name: Real.logb_pos
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 1 x
‚ä¢ LT.lt 0 (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem logb_pos (hx : 1 < x) : 0 < logb b x := by
  rw [logb_pos_iff hb (lt_trans zero_lt_one hx)]
  exact hx

name: Real.logb_neg_iff
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
h : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) 0) (LT.lt x 1)
decl:
theorem logb_neg_iff (h : 0 < x) : logb b x < 0 ‚Üî x < 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê logb_one]
  exact logb_lt_logb_iff hb h zero_lt_one

name: Real.logb_neg
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
h0 : LT.lt 0 x
h1 : LT.lt x 1
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Real.logb b x) 0
decl:
theorem logb_neg (h0 : 0 < x) (h1 : x < 1) : logb b x < 0 :=
  (logb_neg_iff hb h0).2 h1

name: Real.logb_nonneg_iff
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le 0 (Real.logb b x)) (LE.le 1 x)
decl:
theorem logb_nonneg_iff (hx : 0 < x) : 0 ‚â§ logb b x ‚Üî 1 ‚â§ x := by
  rw [‚Üê not_lt, logb_neg_iff hb hx, not_lt]

name: Real.logb_nonneg
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LE.le 1 x
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem logb_nonneg (hx : 1 ‚â§ x) : 0 ‚â§ logb b x :=
  (logb_nonneg_iff hb (zero_lt_one.trans_le hx)).2 hx

name: Real.logb_nonpos_iff
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) 0) (LE.le x 1)
decl:
theorem logb_nonpos_iff (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x ‚â§ 0 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê not_lt, logb_pos_iff hb hx, not_lt]

name: Real.logb_nonpos_iff'
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LE.le 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) 0) (LE.le x 1)
decl:
theorem logb_nonpos_iff' (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) : logb b x ‚â§ 0 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 1 := by
  rcases hx.eq_or_lt with (rfl | hx)
  ¬∑ simp [le_refl, zero_le_one]
  exact logb_nonpos_iff hb hx

name: Real.logb_nonpos
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx : LE.le 0 x
h'x : LE.le x 1
‚ä¢ LE.le (Real.logb b x) 0
decl:
theorem logb_nonpos (hx : 0 ‚â§ x) (h'x : x ‚â§ 1) : logb b x ‚â§ 0 :=
  (logb_nonpos_iff' hb hx).2 h'x

name: Real.strictMonoOn_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ StrictMonoOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Ioi 0)
decl:
theorem strictMonoOn_logb : StrictMonoOn (logb b) (Set.Ioi 0) := fun _ hx _ _ hxy =>
  logb_lt_logb hb hx hxy

name: Real.strictAntiOn_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ StrictAntiOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Iio 0)
decl:
theorem strictAntiOn_logb : StrictAntiOn (logb b) (Set.Iio 0) := by
  rintro x (hx : x < 0) y (hy : y < 0) hxy
  rw [‚Üê logb_abs y, ‚Üê logb_abs x]
  refine logb_lt_logb hb (abs_pos.2 hy.ne) ?_
  rwa [abs_of_neg hy, abs_of_neg hx, neg_lt_neg_iff]

name: Real.logb_injOn_pos
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ Set.InjOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Ioi 0)
decl:
theorem logb_injOn_pos : Set.InjOn (logb b) (Set.Ioi 0) :=
  (strictMonoOn_logb hb).injOn

name: Real.eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
h‚ÇÅ : LT.lt 0 x
h‚ÇÇ : Eq (Real.logb b x) 0
‚ä¢ Eq x 1
decl:
theorem eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero (h‚ÇÅ : 0 < x) (h‚ÇÇ : logb b x = 0) : x = 1 :=
  logb_injOn_pos hb (Set.mem_Ioi.2 h‚ÇÅ) (Set.mem_Ioi.2 zero_lt_one) (h‚ÇÇ.trans Real.logb_one.symm)

name: Real.logb_ne_zero_of_pos_of_ne_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
hx_pos : LT.lt 0 x
hx : Ne x 1
‚ä¢ Ne (Real.logb b x) 0
decl:
theorem logb_ne_zero_of_pos_of_ne_one (hx_pos : 0 < x) (hx : x ‚â† 1) : logb b x ‚â† 0 :=
  mt (eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero hb hx_pos) hx

name: Real.tendsto_logb_atTop
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) Filter.atTop Filter.atTop
decl:
theorem tendsto_logb_atTop : Tendsto (logb b) atTop atTop :=
  Tendsto.atTop_div_const (log_pos hb) tendsto_log_atTop

name: Real.logb_le_logb_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
h : LT.lt 0 x
h‚ÇÅ : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)) (LE.le y x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_le_logb_of_base_lt_one (h : 0 < x) (h‚ÇÅ : 0 < y) : logb b x ‚â§ logb b y ‚Üî y ‚â§ x := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_le_div_right_of_neg (log_neg b_pos b_lt_one), log_le_log_iff h‚ÇÅ h]

name: Real.logb_lt_logb_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hxy : LT.lt x y
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Real.logb b y) (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem logb_lt_logb_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) (hxy : x < y) : logb b y < logb b x := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_lt_div_right_of_neg (log_neg b_pos b_lt_one)]
  exact log_lt_log hx hxy

name: Real.logb_lt_logb_iff_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) (Real.logb b y)) (LT.lt y x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_lt_logb_iff_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) :
    logb b x < logb b y ‚Üî y < x := by
  rw [logb, logb, div_lt_div_right_of_neg (log_neg b_pos b_lt_one)]
  exact log_lt_log_iff hy hx

name: Real.logb_le_iff_le_rpow_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) y) (LE.le (HPow.hPow b y) x)
decl:
theorem logb_le_iff_le_rpow_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x ‚â§ y ‚Üî b ^ y ‚â§ x := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_le_rpow_left_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one, rpow_logb b_pos (b_ne_one b_lt_one) hx]

name: Real.logb_lt_iff_lt_rpow_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) y) (LT.lt (HPow.hPow b y) x)
decl:
theorem logb_lt_iff_lt_rpow_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x < y ‚Üî b ^ y < x := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_lt_rpow_left_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one, rpow_logb b_pos (b_ne_one b_lt_one) hx]

name: Real.le_logb_iff_rpow_le_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le x (Real.logb b y)) (LE.le y (HPow.hPow b x))
decl:
theorem le_logb_iff_rpow_le_of_base_lt_one (hy : 0 < y) : x ‚â§ logb b y ‚Üî y ‚â§ b ^ x := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_le_rpow_left_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one, rpow_logb b_pos (b_ne_one b_lt_one) hy]

name: Real.lt_logb_iff_rpow_lt_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x y : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hy : LT.lt 0 y
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt x (Real.logb b y)) (LT.lt y (HPow.hPow b x))
decl:
theorem lt_logb_iff_rpow_lt_of_base_lt_one (hy : 0 < y) : x < logb b y ‚Üî y < b ^ x := by
  rw [‚Üê rpow_lt_rpow_left_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one, rpow_logb b_pos (b_ne_one b_lt_one) hy]

name: Real.logb_pos_iff_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt 0 (Real.logb b x)) (LT.lt x 1)
decl:
theorem logb_pos_iff_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) : 0 < logb b x ‚Üî x < 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê @logb_one b, logb_lt_logb_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one zero_lt_one hx]

name: Real.logb_pos_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hx' : LT.lt x 1
‚ä¢ LT.lt 0 (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem logb_pos_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) (hx' : x < 1) : 0 < logb b x := by
  rw [logb_pos_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx]
  exact hx'

name: Real.logb_neg_iff_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
h : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.logb b x) 0) (LT.lt 1 x)
decl:
theorem logb_neg_iff_of_base_lt_one (h : 0 < x) : logb b x < 0 ‚Üî 1 < x := by
  rw [‚Üê @logb_one b, logb_lt_logb_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one h zero_lt_one]

name: Real.logb_neg_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
h1 : LT.lt 1 x
‚ä¢ LT.lt (Real.logb b x) 0
decl:
theorem logb_neg_of_base_lt_one (h1 : 1 < x) : logb b x < 0 :=
  (logb_neg_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one (lt_trans zero_lt_one h1)).2 h1

name: Real.logb_nonneg_iff_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le 0 (Real.logb b x)) (LE.le x 1)
decl:
theorem logb_nonneg_iff_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) : 0 ‚â§ logb b x ‚Üî x ‚â§ 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê not_lt, logb_neg_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx, not_lt]

name: Real.logb_nonneg_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
hx' : LE.le x 1
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (Real.logb b x)
decl:
theorem logb_nonneg_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) (hx' : x ‚â§ 1) : 0 ‚â§ logb b x := by
  rw [logb_nonneg_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx]
  exact hx'

name: Real.logb_nonpos_iff_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx : LT.lt 0 x
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.logb b x) 0) (LE.le 1 x)
decl:
theorem logb_nonpos_iff_of_base_lt_one (hx : 0 < x) : logb b x ‚â§ 0 ‚Üî 1 ‚â§ x := by
  rw [‚Üê not_lt, logb_pos_iff_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx, not_lt]

name: Real.strictAntiOn_logb_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ StrictAntiOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Ioi 0)
decl:
theorem strictAntiOn_logb_of_base_lt_one : StrictAntiOn (logb b) (Set.Ioi 0) := fun _ hx _ _ hxy =>
  logb_lt_logb_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx hxy

name: Real.strictMonoOn_logb_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ StrictMonoOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Iio 0)
decl:
theorem strictMonoOn_logb_of_base_lt_one : StrictMonoOn (logb b) (Set.Iio 0) := by
  rintro x (hx : x < 0) y (hy : y < 0) hxy
  rw [‚Üê logb_abs y, ‚Üê logb_abs x]
  refine logb_lt_logb_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one (abs_pos.2 hy.ne) ?_
  rwa [abs_of_neg hy, abs_of_neg hx, neg_lt_neg_iff]

name: Real.logb_injOn_pos_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ Set.InjOn (Real.logb b) (Set.Ioi 0)
decl:
theorem logb_injOn_pos_of_base_lt_one : Set.InjOn (logb b) (Set.Ioi 0) :=
  (strictAntiOn_logb_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one).injOn

name: Real.eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
h‚ÇÅ : LT.lt 0 x
h‚ÇÇ : Eq (Real.logb b x) 0
‚ä¢ Eq x 1
decl:
theorem eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero_of_base_lt_one (h‚ÇÅ : 0 < x) (h‚ÇÇ : logb b x = 0) : x = 1 :=
  logb_injOn_pos_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one (Set.mem_Ioi.2 h‚ÇÅ) (Set.mem_Ioi.2 zero_lt_one)
    (h‚ÇÇ.trans Real.logb_one.symm)

name: Real.logb_ne_zero_of_pos_of_ne_one_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b x : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
hx_pos : LT.lt 0 x
hx : Ne x 1
‚ä¢ Ne (Real.logb b x) 0
decl:
theorem logb_ne_zero_of_pos_of_ne_one_of_base_lt_one (hx_pos : 0 < x) (hx : x ‚â† 1) : logb b x ‚â† 0 :=
  mt (eq_one_of_pos_of_logb_eq_zero_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one hx_pos) hx

name: Real.tendsto_logb_atTop_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
b_pos : LT.lt 0 b
b_lt_one : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) Filter.atTop Filter.atBot
decl:
theorem tendsto_logb_atTop_of_base_lt_one : Tendsto (logb b) atTop atBot := by
  rw [tendsto_atTop_atBot]
  intro e
  use 1 ‚äî b ^ e
  intro a
  simp only [and_imp, sup_le_iff]
  intro ha
  rw [logb_le_iff_le_rpow_of_base_lt_one b_pos b_lt_one]
  ¬∑ tauto
  ¬∑ exact lt_of_lt_of_le zero_lt_one ha

name: Real.floor_logb_natCast
initialProofState:
b : Nat
r : Real
hr : LE.le 0 r
‚ä¢ Eq (Int.floor (Real.logb (‚Üëb) r)) (Int.log b r)
decl:
theorem floor_logb_natCast {b : ‚Ñï} {r : ‚Ñù} (hr : 0 ‚â§ r) :
    ‚åälogb b r‚åã = Int.log b r := by
  obtain rfl | hr := hr.eq_or_lt
  ¬∑ rw [logb_zero, Int.log_zero_right, Int.floor_zero]
  by_cases hb : 1 < b
  ¬∑ have hb1' : 1 < (b : ‚Ñù) := Nat.one_lt_cast.mpr hb
    apply le_antisymm
    ¬∑ rw [‚Üê Int.zpow_le_iff_le_log hb hr, ‚Üê rpow_intCast b]
      refine le_of_le_of_eq ?_ (rpow_logb (zero_lt_one.trans hb1') hb1'.ne' hr)
      exact rpow_le_rpow_of_exponent_le hb1'.le (Int.floor_le _)
    ¬∑ rw [Int.le_floor, le_logb_iff_rpow_le hb1' hr, rpow_intCast]
      exact Int.zpow_log_le_self hb hr
  ¬∑ rw [Nat.one_lt_iff_ne_zero_and_ne_one, ‚Üê or_iff_not_and_not] at hb
    cases hb
    ¬∑ simp_all only [CharP.cast_eq_zero, logb_zero_left, Int.floor_zero, Int.log_zero_left]
    ¬∑ simp_all only [Nat.cast_one, logb_one_left, Int.floor_zero, Int.log_one_left]

name: Real.ceil_logb_natCast
initialProofState:
b : Nat
r : Real
hr : LE.le 0 r
‚ä¢ Eq (Int.ceil (Real.logb (‚Üëb) r)) (Int.clog b r)
decl:
theorem ceil_logb_natCast {b : ‚Ñï} {r : ‚Ñù} (hr : 0 ‚â§ r) :
    ‚åàlogb b r‚åâ = Int.clog b r := by
  obtain rfl | hr := hr.eq_or_lt
  ¬∑ rw [logb_zero, Int.clog_zero_right, Int.ceil_zero]
  by_cases hb : 1 < b
  ¬∑ have hb1' : 1 < (b : ‚Ñù) := Nat.one_lt_cast.mpr hb
    apply le_antisymm
    ¬∑ rw [Int.ceil_le, logb_le_iff_le_rpow hb1' hr, rpow_intCast]
      exact Int.self_le_zpow_clog hb r
    ¬∑ rw [‚Üê Int.le_zpow_iff_clog_le hb hr, ‚Üê rpow_intCast b]
      refine (rpow_logb (zero_lt_one.trans hb1') hb1'.ne' hr).symm.trans_le ?_
      exact rpow_le_rpow_of_exponent_le hb1'.le (Int.le_ceil _)
  ¬∑ rw [Nat.one_lt_iff_ne_zero_and_ne_one, ‚Üê or_iff_not_and_not] at hb
    cases hb
    ¬∑ simp_all only [CharP.cast_eq_zero, logb_zero_left, Int.ceil_zero, Int.clog_zero_left]
    ¬∑ simp_all only [Nat.cast_one, logb_one_left, Int.ceil_zero, Int.clog_one_left]

name: Real.natLog_le_logb
initialProofState:
a b : Nat
‚ä¢ LE.le (‚Üë(Nat.log b a)) (Real.logb ‚Üëb ‚Üëa)
decl:
lemma natLog_le_logb (a b : ‚Ñï) : Nat.log b a ‚â§ Real.logb b a := by
  apply le_trans _ (Int.floor_le ((b : ‚Ñù).logb a))
  rw [Real.floor_logb_natCast (Nat.cast_nonneg a), Int.log_natCast, Int.cast_natCast]

name: Real.logb_eq_zero
initialProofState:
b x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (Real.logb b x) 0) (Or (Eq b 0) (Or (Eq b 1) (Or (Eq b (-1)) (Or (Eq x 0) (Or (Eq x 1) (Eq x (-1)))))))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem logb_eq_zero : logb b x = 0 ‚Üî b = 0 ‚à® b = 1 ‚à® b = -1 ‚à® x = 0 ‚à® x = 1 ‚à® x = -1 := by
  simp_rw [logb, div_eq_zero_iff, log_eq_zero]
  tauto

name: Real.tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) (nhdsWithin 0 (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton 0))) Filter.atBot
decl:
theorem tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero (hb : 1 < b) :
    Tendsto (logb b) (ùìù[‚â†] 0) atBot :=
  tendsto_log_nhdsWithin_zero.atBot_div_const (log_pos hb)

name: Real.tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb‚ÇÄ : LT.lt 0 b
hb : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) (nhdsWithin 0 (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton 0))) Filter.atTop
decl:
theorem tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_of_base_lt_one (hb‚ÇÄ : 0 < b) (hb : b < 1) :
    Tendsto (logb b) (ùìù[‚â†] 0) atTop :=
  tendsto_log_nhdsWithin_zero.atBot_mul_const_of_neg (inv_lt_zero.2 (log_neg hb‚ÇÄ hb))

name: Real.tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_right
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb : LT.lt 1 b
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) (nhdsWithin 0 (Set.Ioi 0)) Filter.atBot
decl:
lemma tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_right (hb : 1 < b) : Tendsto (logb b) (ùìù[>] 0) atBot :=
  tendsto_log_nhdsWithin_zero_right.atBot_div_const (log_pos hb)

name: Real.tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_right_of_base_lt_one
initialProofState:
b : Real
hb‚ÇÄ : LT.lt 0 b
hb : LT.lt b 1
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (Real.logb b) (nhdsWithin 0 (Set.Ioi 0)) Filter.atTop
decl:
lemma tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_right_of_base_lt_one (hb‚ÇÄ : 0 < b) (hb : b < 1) :
    Tendsto (logb b) (ùìù[>] 0) atTop :=
  tendsto_log_nhdsWithin_zero_right.atBot_mul_const_of_neg (inv_lt_zero.2 (log_neg hb‚ÇÄ hb))

name: Real.continuousOn_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ ContinuousOn (Real.logb b) (HasCompl.compl (Singleton.singleton 0))
decl: theorem continuousOn_logb : ContinuousOn (logb b) {0}·∂ú := continuousOn_log.div_const _

name: Real.continuous_logb
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ Continuous fun x => Real.logb b ‚Üëx
decl:
/-- The real logarithm base b is continuous as a function from nonzero reals. -/
@[fun_prop]
theorem continuous_logb : Continuous fun x : { x : ‚Ñù // x ‚â† 0 } => logb b x :=
  continuous_log.div_const _

name: Real.continuous_logb'
initialProofState:
b : Real
‚ä¢ Continuous fun x => Real.logb b ‚Üëx
decl:
/-- The real logarithm base b is continuous as a function from positive reals. -/
@[fun_prop]
theorem continuous_logb' : Continuous fun x : { x : ‚Ñù // 0 < x } => logb b x :=
  continuous_log'.div_const _

name: Real.continuousAt_logb
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hx : Ne x 0
‚ä¢ ContinuousAt (Real.logb b) x
decl:
theorem continuousAt_logb (hx : x ‚â† 0) : ContinuousAt (logb b) x :=
  (continuousAt_log hx).div_const _

name: Real.continuousAt_logb_iff
initialProofState:
b x : Real
hb‚ÇÄ : LT.lt 0 b
hb : Ne b 1
‚ä¢ Iff (ContinuousAt (Real.logb b) x) (Ne x 0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem continuousAt_logb_iff (hb‚ÇÄ : 0 < b) (hb : b ‚â† 1) : ContinuousAt (logb b) x ‚Üî x ‚â† 0 := by
  refine ‚ü®?_, continuousAt_logb‚ü©
  rintro h rfl
  cases lt_or_gt_of_ne hb with
  | inl hb‚ÇÅ =>
      exact not_tendsto_nhds_of_tendsto_atTop (tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero_of_base_lt_one hb‚ÇÄ hb‚ÇÅ)
        _ (h.tendsto.mono_left inf_le_left)
  | inr hb‚ÇÅ =>
      exact not_tendsto_nhds_of_tendsto_atBot (tendsto_logb_nhdsWithin_zero hb‚ÇÅ)
        _ (h.tendsto.mono_left inf_le_left)

name: Real.logb_prod
initialProofState:
b : Real
Œ± : Type u_1
s : Finset Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí Real
hf : ‚àÄ (x : Œ±), Membership.mem s x ‚Üí Ne (f x) 0
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (s.prod fun i => f i)) (s.sum fun i => Real.logb b (f i))
decl:
theorem logb_prod {Œ± : Type*} (s : Finset Œ±) (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (hf : ‚àÄ x ‚àà s, f x ‚â† 0) :
    logb b (‚àè i ‚àà s, f i) = ‚àë i ‚àà s, logb b (f i) := by
  classical
    induction' s using Finset.induction_on with a s ha ih
    ¬∑ simp
    simp only [Finset.mem_insert, forall_eq_or_imp] at hf
    simp [ha, ih hf.2, logb_mul hf.1 (Finset.prod_ne_zero_iff.2 hf.2)]

name: Finsupp.logb_prod
initialProofState:
b : Real
Œ± : Type u_1
Œ≤ : Type u_2
inst‚úù : Zero Œ≤
f : Finsupp Œ± Œ≤
g : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Real
hg : ‚àÄ (a : Œ±), Eq (g a (f a)) 0 ‚Üí Eq (f a) 0
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b (f.prod g)) (f.sum fun a c => Real.logb b (g a c))
decl:
protected theorem _root_.Finsupp.logb_prod {Œ± Œ≤ : Type*} [Zero Œ≤] (f : Œ± ‚Üí‚ÇÄ Œ≤) (g : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
    (hg : ‚àÄ a, g a (f a) = 0 ‚Üí f a = 0) : logb b (f.prod g) = f.sum fun a c ‚Ü¶ logb b (g a c) :=
  logb_prod _ _ fun _x hx h‚ÇÄ ‚Ü¶ Finsupp.mem_support_iff.1 hx <| hg _ h‚ÇÄ

name: Real.logb_nat_eq_sum_factorization
initialProofState:
b : Real
n : Nat
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.logb b ‚Üën) (n.factorization.sum fun p t => HMul.hMul (‚Üët) (Real.logb b ‚Üëp))
decl:
theorem logb_nat_eq_sum_factorization (n : ‚Ñï) :
    logb b n = n.factorization.sum fun p t => t * logb b p := by
  simp only [logb, mul_div_assoc', log_nat_eq_sum_factorization n, Finsupp.sum, Finset.sum_div]

name: Real.induction_Ico_mul
initialProofState:
P : Real ‚Üí Prop
x‚ÇÄ r : Real
hr : LT.lt 1 r
hx‚ÇÄ : LT.lt 0 x‚ÇÄ
base : ‚àÄ (x : Real), Membership.mem (Set.Ico x‚ÇÄ (HMul.hMul r x‚ÇÄ)) x ‚Üí P x
step : ‚àÄ (n : Nat), GE.ge n 1 ‚Üí (‚àÄ (z : Real), Membership.mem (Set.Ico x‚ÇÄ (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow r n) x‚ÇÄ)) z ‚Üí P z) ‚Üí ‚àÄ (z : Real), Membership.mem (Set.Ico (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow r n) x‚ÇÄ) (HMul.hMul (HPow.hPow r (HAdd.hAdd n 1)) x‚ÇÄ)) z ‚Üí P z
x : Real
a‚úù : GE.ge x x‚ÇÄ
‚ä¢ P x
decl:
/-- Induction principle for intervals of real numbers: if a proposition `P` is true
on `[x‚ÇÄ, r * x‚ÇÄ)` and if `P` for `[x‚ÇÄ, r^n * x‚ÇÄ)` implies `P` for `[r^n * x‚ÇÄ, r^(n+1) * x‚ÇÄ)`,
then `P` is true for all `x ‚â• x‚ÇÄ`. -/
lemma Real.induction_Ico_mul {P : ‚Ñù ‚Üí Prop} (x‚ÇÄ r : ‚Ñù) (hr : 1 < r) (hx‚ÇÄ : 0 < x‚ÇÄ)
    (base : ‚àÄ x ‚àà Set.Ico x‚ÇÄ (r * x‚ÇÄ), P x)
    (step : ‚àÄ n : ‚Ñï, n ‚â• 1 ‚Üí (‚àÄ z ‚àà Set.Ico x‚ÇÄ (r ^ n * x‚ÇÄ), P z) ‚Üí
      (‚àÄ z ‚àà Set.Ico (r ^ n * x‚ÇÄ) (r ^ (n+1) * x‚ÇÄ), P z)) :
    ‚àÄ x ‚â• x‚ÇÄ, P x := by
  suffices ‚àÄ n : ‚Ñï, ‚àÄ x ‚àà Set.Ico x‚ÇÄ (r ^ (n + 1) * x‚ÇÄ), P x by
    intro x hx
    have hx' : 0 < x / x‚ÇÄ := div_pos (hx‚ÇÄ.trans_le hx) hx‚ÇÄ
    refine this ‚åälogb r (x / x‚ÇÄ)‚åã‚Çä x ?_
    rw [mem_Ico, ‚Üê div_lt_iff‚ÇÄ hx‚ÇÄ, ‚Üê rpow_natCast, ‚Üê logb_lt_iff_lt_rpow hr hx', Nat.cast_add,
      Nat.cast_one]
    exact ‚ü®hx, Nat.lt_floor_add_one _‚ü©
  intro n
  induction n with
  | zero => simpa using base
  | succ n ih =>
    exact fun x hx => (Ico_subset_Ico_union_Ico hx).elim (ih x) (step (n + 1) (by simp) ih _)
